title: championship ashe border and icon
body: Hi! i just got 120 Worlds token so i can unlock championship ashe border and icon, does that mean that i will only get the border and icon or will i get the skin aswell?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=linusbams,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4L0XfyKF,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-10-24T16:28:21.606+0000)
>
> Hi! i just got 120 Worlds token so i can unlock championship ashe border and icon, does that mean that i will only get the border and icon or will i get the skin aswell?

You get the champ icon and border but the border will only be applied when using championship Ashe {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} No prob on informing you glhfXDD
What is the border? I don't get it.
You won't get the skin. You have to buy it.
The bundle only mentions the Icon and Border, the skin is completely separate.
